comments.raw_text:
Firefox and Fennec use the attribute "content-primary" on browsers to set the primary content docshell. As of now, they live here:

http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/layout/generic/nsSubDocumentFrame.cpp#755
http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/content/base/src/nsFrameLoader.cpp#699

bz tells me this allows for link clicks to _content and _main, which is used for sidebars.

comments.author: ben@stechz.com

comments.raw_text: Note that we don't necessarily need ContentShellAdded.  We just need the link targeting to work.
